*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Gov. Rafael Gonzales, June 4, 1825. Describing boundaries of his colonies.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Executive Department*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*Free State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Herewith I remit signed by myself the articles of agreement proposed by *person_mentioned*Your Excellency*/person_mentioned*, relative to the Colonization of *person_mentioned*three hundred families */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*within the limits designated for this Colony*/location_mentioned* already established. These boundaries were designated by *person_mentioned*His Honor, the Political Chief of Texas*/person_mentioned*, when he was at this place, by the order dated *date_mentioned n="05-20-1824">20th May 1824*/date_mentioned*, the original of which I herewith hand to *person_mentioned*Your Excellency*/person_mentioned*. His Honor the said *person_mentioned*Political Chief */person_mentioned*subsequently made an official communication to me under date of *date_mentioned n="09-21-1824">21st September 1824*/date_mentioned*, relative to colonizing on the *location_mentioned*River San Jacinto*/location_mentioned* a copy of which I herewith remit, in order that with these documents present and keeping in view the *location_mentioned*grants made to the other *person_mentioned*Empresarios*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* Your *person_mentioned*Excellency */person_mentioned*may determine the exact boundaries of the respective *location_mentioned*settlements*/location_mentioned*, to prevent all doubts as respects the respective *location_mentioned*boundaries*/location_mentioned*. The *location_mentioned*Chocolate Creek*/location_mentioned* spoken of in the order of the *person_mentioned*Political Chief*/person_mentioned* is situated *location_mentioned*between the Rivers Brazos and San Jacinto*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*God and Liberty,*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-04-1825">4th June 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*His Excellency Rafael Gonzalez Governor of the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned*.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*A. Copy, Signed, *person_mentioned*Padilla*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
